sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Binaries and Scripts in Public Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a file with a suspicious extension in the public folder, which could indicate potential malicious activity.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential Defense Evasion Via Rename Of Highly Relevant Binaries
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the execution of a renamed binary often used by attackers or malware leveraging new Sysmon OriginalFileName datapoint.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Matthew Green - @mgreen27, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), frack113

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=CBFD746699A0C0D37597F91F3F4ED2CE6213025C,MD5=57A6B4BDF247C1A6CA08AC09A8F9B742,SHA256=98D37EFF504A7ADB864131EA4A042AAF4D79C4356960A8AB2FA656CC59AEC014,IMPHASH=5C68DE198B5D2DD5C1129782AD19676C; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; OriginalFileName=RUNDLL32.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows host process (Rundll32); FileVersion=10.0.22621.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s BITS; CommandLine="C:\Users\Public\Documents\DataExchangeHost.exe"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Users\Public\Documents\DataExchangeHost.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a service binary running in a suspicious directory

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Hidden Executable In NTFS Alternate Data Stream
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of an ADS (Alternate Data Stream) that contains an executable by looking at a non-empty Imphash

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Rundll32 Execution With Uncommon DLL Extension
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the execution of rundll32 with a command line that doesn't contain a common extension
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Tim Shelton, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Yassine Oukessou
